thread.title: Iraqi PM Abadi says election fraud allegations to be investigated

title: Iraqi PM Abadi says election fraud allegations to be investigated
text:
May 24, 2018 / 4:50 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago Iraqi PM Abadi says election fraud allegations to be investigated Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi said on Thursday a committee will investigate allegations of fraud in the May 12 national elections, according to a statement from his office. Iraqi Prime Minister Haidar al-Abadi speaks to his supporters during election campaign in Sulaimaniyah, Iraq April 25, 2018. REUTERS/Ako Rasheed
The committee will be led by the head of the financial control bureau, the statement said. Reporting by Raya Jalabi; editing by John Stonestreet
